page.title: 19Homelife and Gardens.
page.content: Generally,houses are small and fairly uniform in accomodation, 3-4 bed- rooms, 2 sitting rooms, kitchen and indoors bathroom and lavatory. There are some grander houses, a few still privately occupied by very wealthy owners; several have been divided into flats or individual appartments. A mobile homes site is occupied by retired and working people. Most households are family groups; normally with washing machine, refrigerator and television: most have telephone and freezer. People take a pride in their homes, the majority being owner occupied. Gardens being bright with flowers, lawns are extending while the vegetable patch shrinks. The advent of the Farm Shop and'Pick Your Own'fruit and vegetables is partly responsible, but birds and pests deter the less skilled gardener.
